review: It has a tough time picking up my wifi sometimes. I had intended to switch it between my grandkids' bedrooms but it was easier to buy one for each than to try to get it to recognize wifi every time I moved it. I also have the box version and it works perfectly every time no matter where I hook it up. The wifi reception on the Stick is much weaker and less reliable than the box.
